data.title: The Leading Well and Water Treatment and Repair Company Since 1957.
data.meta_description: Phelps Water Company is one of the leading water treatment and well repair companies in Maryland. We focus on determining the right type of water treatment application to meet each customer's needs, including: 1) Water treatment for low pH, odors, iron, lead, bacteria, arsenic and radium. Conditioners, water softeners, inline filters, and reverse osmosis drinking water systems are also available, 2) Well pump and pressure tank replacement, leaks, service lines from well to house and upgrades for irrigation and increase of pressure, and 3) Installation and service of all major brands of water softeners, acid neutralizer filters, reverse osmosis, arsenic removal, odor removal, UV sterilizers, and chemical feed systems. For service you can trust again and again, call Phelps Water Company today (410) 956-2522.
data.text:
The best way to eliminate bacteria from your water is to install an Ultra Violet light. The ultra violet light bulb eliminates 99% of bacteria that comes through your system to ensure that your water is clean and free of most bacterias. Our Ultra Violet light system is installed after the pressure tank and any existing water treatment. We offer a range of systems based on flow rates fro 5gpm to 100gpm

Note: We highly recommend pre-treating the water prior to the Uv System to get the best quality water possible.

**We can service and install any UV light systems

**Call us for pricing and installation options (410) 956-2522

Phelps Water Company is one of the leading water treatment and well repair companies in the State of Maryland. We focus on determining the right type of water treatment application to meet each customers needs. For service you can trust again and again, call Phelps Water Company today (410) 956-2522.
